title: Pete Wishart – 2023 Comments After Commons Report Published that Boris Johnson Knowingly Lied to Parliament
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Pete Wishart, the SNP MP for Perth and North Perthshire, on Twitter on 15 June 2023.
content:
Now everyone can see the full scale and horror of Johnson’s repeated lies and contempt for democracy. The question now is why on earth did the Conservative Party put up with this and allow him to dominate our public life for so long?
